jcr:content.jcr:description: At Altra, we offer a wide variety of running shoe options with different features for wherever the trail takes you. Find the best trail running shoe for you!
jcr:content.jcr:title: How to Choose a Trail Running Shoe
jcr:content.pageTitle: How to Choose the Best Trail Running Shoes for Your Run

image.alt: Knees-down shot of two women trail running in Altra Running trail shoes

text.text:
How to Choose the Best Trail Running Shoes for Your Run

What trail running shoes are best for you?

When it comes to running, the most important piece of equipment is your shoes. The right shoe builds the foundation for your running. Finding the right shoe for your specific needs is crucial to maximizing your run’s potential. At Altra, we offer a wide variety of running shoe options, all range of capabilities and features for wherever the trail takes you. Whatever you’re looking for, Altra has you covered.

 

So, how can you make sure to find the shoe that’s best for you? Let’s take a look at some must-have features for any trail running shoe and break down each of our trail running shoes to find exactly what you need.

 

Or, you can always use our Shoe Finder tool. In just a few questions and a couple of minutes, we’ll provide a few options that fit your specific needs.

What to look for in your trail running shoes

There are many different trail running shoes, but what makes one better than the other? What are the qualities that make the best shoes for the trails? Here are some of the top things to look for in your next pair of shoes.

First and foremost, comfort is crucial. Having dependable, high-tech shoes means nothing if they cause you discomfort throughout your run. The right amount of comfort helps build a strong foundation from the ground up that will help keep you going for miles on end. That's why all Altra shoes are designed with FootShape™ Comfort to allow your feet to spread out naturally and experience maximum comfort through natural movement.

Next, find a shoe that can withstand whatever you put it through. Durability matters on the trails. This is where the material a shoe is made from comes into play. Look for a shoe that offers all weather-resistant capabilities, like the Altra ALL-WTHR series that ensures you don’t have to slow down when the weather picks up.

text_628499060.text: Women's Lone Peak ALL-WTHR Low

text_1368784066.text:
In addition to durability, whatever your level of trail running, it’s important to find a shoe with an outsole that helps you run fast, controlled, and protected. The best trail running shoes should provide an outsole that offers adequate grip and traction for all-terrain—tame and technical.

Lastly, cushion counts. Figuring out what level of cushion you prefer is unique to every runner, but here are some basics every trail running shoe should have. For starters, a Balanced Cushioning™ platform that positions your heel and forefoot at an equal distance from the ground. This feature can be found in all Altra shoes and encourages better alignment, better form, and a low impact landing. Now let’s look for the actual level of cushion you prefer in your shoe. If you’re looking for a high cushion shoe, check out our options with a thicker midsole for a soft, yet responsive ride like the Olympus 4 or the Timp 3. For those looking for more of an underfoot feel, explore options with a thinner midsole like the Superior 5 or the Lone Peak 5.

text.text:
SUPERIOR 5

The Superior 5 has it all. Made for speed, versatility, grip, and protection with the technology to keep you going on the trail. This outsole comes complete with multi-directional lug patterns to help you keep cruising.

FEATURES 
  • FootShape™ comfort to give your feet more space to sit naturally.
  • Balanced Cushioning™ to encourage better alignment, better form, and low impact landing.
  • MaxTrac™ outsole provides the perfect combination of grip, traction, and durability on all types of terrain.
  • Trailclaw™ lugs strategically placed to provide added traction underfoot.
  • GaiterTrap™ hook-and-loop Tab allows our strapless gaiter to easily attach to the shoe, adding protection against rocks and debris.
  • InnerFlex™ technology for added flexibility and movement.
  • Removeable StoneGuard™ for added underfoot rock protection—when you want it.

LONE PEAK 5

The Lone Peak 5 is known as a trail shoe, plain and simple. This newest edition includes a midsole with an extra level of response and cushion in each step along with an outsole engineered for all types of terrain.

FEATURES 
  • FootShape™ Comfort to give your feet more space to sit naturally.
  • Balanced Cushioning™ to encourage better alignment, better form, and low impact landing.
  • Altra EGO™ midsole foam designed to provide added energy return and a responsive, yet soft, comfortable feel.
  • MaxTrac™ outsole provides the perfect combination of grip, traction, and durability on all types of terrain.
  • Trailclaw™ lugs strategically placed to provide added traction underfoot.
  • GaiterTrap™ hook-and-loop Tab allows our strapless gaiter to easily attach to the shoe, adding protection against rocks and debris.

LONE PEAK ALL-WTHR

Lone Peak ALL-WTHR is a reinvented take on the classic Lone Peak. Taking all the best qualities of the Lone Peak and adding a weather-resistant eVent® makes this the perfect shoe for any trail condition. This shoe features a responsive, supportive midsole and a grippy outsole for any adventure.

FEATURES 
  • FootShape™ Comfort to give your feet more space to sit naturally.
  • Balanced Cushioning™ to encourage better alignment, better form, and low impact landing.
  • MaxTrac™ outsole provides the perfect combination of grip, traction, and durability on all types of terrain.
  • Trailclaw™ lugs strategically placed to provide added traction underfoot.
  • eVent®  weather resistant bootie construction.

image.alt: Women's Altra Lone Peak ALL-WTHR Mid

text_628499060_copy.text: Women's Lone Peak ALL-WTHR Mid

text.text:
TIMP 3

Engineered for high-performance mile after mile, the Timp 3 is ready to take you wherever you want to go. The outsole and midsole work together to provide continuous comfort and grip for all terrain on those long, gritty trail days.

FEATURES 
  • FootShape™ Comfort to give your feet more space to sit naturally.
  • Balanced Cushioning™ to encourage better alignment, better form, and low impact landing.
  • MaxTrac™ outsole provides the perfect combination of grip, traction, and durability on all types of terrain.
  • Trailclaw™ lugs strategically placed to provide added traction underfoot.
  • GaiterTrap™ hook-and-loop allows our strapless gaiter to easily attach to the shoe, adding protection against rocks and debris.

OLYMPUS 4

The latest Olympus model has everything you need for a trail adventure. The durable mesh upper is tailored to your foot for a locked-in feel. This shoe’s outsole excels in both wet and dry conditions while the high-performance midsole offers comfort and flexibility like never before.

FEATURES 
  • FootShape™ Comfort to give your feet more space to sit naturally.
  • Balanced Cushioning™ to encourage better alignment, better form, and low impact landing.
  • Trailclaw™ lugs strategically placed to provide added traction underfoot.
  • GaiterTrap™ hook-and-loop allows our strapless gaiter to easily attach to the shoe, adding protection against rocks and debris.
  • InnerFlex™ technology for added flexibility and movement.
  • Vibram® Megagrip™ outsole with high-performance sticky rubber that offers unparalleled grip on both wet and dry surfaces, rugged longevity, and optimal ground adaptability.
